name: Chrysanthemum
description:
Chrysanthemum is an anime/magic-fantasy model.

Huggingface Repo

A merge of:

  • Perceptron_v2

  • duelanimemix_v1

  • henmixReal_v30

Recommended Settings:

Most settings should be experimented with for best results. Follow this video for better details/quality.

Sampling Method: DPM++ 2M Karras / DPM++ SDE Karras

Sampling Steps: 20-38+

Hires Fix: ✅

  • Upscaler: Latent (nearest-exact)/RealESRGAN_x4plus_anime_6B

  • Hires steps: 0

  • Denoising strength: 0.5-0.6

CFG Scale: 7.5-10

Clip Skip: 1/2

Suggested Embeddings:

  • easynegative

  • bad-hands-5

  • bad_prompt_version2

  • ng_deepnegative_v1_75t

Suggested VAE:

  • anything-v4.0

  • vae-ft-mse-840000-ema-pruned

  • clearvae
